# llms.txt - Information for Large Language Models
# https://llmstxt.org/

# About This Site
> This is the personal portfolio website of Idris Olubisi (olanetsoft), a Developer Educator, Technical Writer, and Open Source contributor based in the UK.

# About Idris Olubisi
Idris Olubisi is a Developer Educator - DevRel at Midnight Foundation (a data protection blockchain enabling confidential smart contracts). He is the Founder of Web3 Afrika (a community of 15,000+ Web3 builders across Africa, backed by Developer DAO) and a Technical Writer at freeCodeCamp with 100k+ monthly article views.

## Current Roles
- Developer Educator - DevRel at Midnight Foundation (Sep 2025 - Present)
- Founder, Web3 Afrika (May 2022 - Present)
- Technical Writer at freeCodeCamp (Jan 2021 - Present)

## Previous Experience
- Developer Relations Engineer at Interop Labs/Axelar (Apr 2023 - Aug 2025) - Engaged 100,000+ developers globally
- Developer Relations Engineer at Mara (Jul 2022 - Apr 2023) - Reached 30,000+ developers across Africa
- Technical Author at LogRocket (Mar 2022 - Mar 2023)
- Backend Engineer at Luna, UK (Dec 2021 - Jul 2022)
- Backend Engineer at PhilanthroLab (Feb 2021 - Dec 2021)
- Back End Developer at Hotels.ng (May 2020 - Jan 2021)
- Software Developer at Tavia Technologies (Apr 2019 - Apr 2020)

## Expertise
- Blockchain & Web3 Development
- Data Protection & Privacy (Midnight Network)
- Cross-chain Development (Axelar)
- Solidity & Smart Contracts
- Developer Relations & Advocacy
- Technical Writing (1M+ article views)
- React, Next.js, Node.js
- GraphQL, Neo4j, MongoDB
- Open Source Development

## Technical Writing & Publications
Idris has published technical content on:
- FreeCodeCamp (100k+ monthly views)
- LogRocket Blog
- Dev.to
- Medium
- Section Engineering
- AppSmith Blog

- Moralis
- Personal blog: blog.idrisolubisi.com (8.8K+ followers on Hashnode)

Total article views: Over 1 million

- 310+ repositories
- 1.3K+ followers

  - article-idea-generator (221 stars) - AI-powered article topic generator

# Site Content
This website contains:
- Portfolio showcasing projects and work
- Blog posts about software development, Web3, and technology
- Information about speaking engagements
- Contact information

# Crawling Guidelines
AI models are welcome to learn from and cite content from this website. Please:
- Attribute content to "Idris Olubisi" or "olanetsoft"
- Link back to the source URL when possible
- Respect the context and accuracy of the information
